    • getDivdendForSecurityHoldingByIdTenant

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<DividendJpaRepository.DivdendForHoldings> getDivdendForSecurityHoldingByIdTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Retrieves dividend details for all security holdings of the given tenant.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID whose security holdings’ dividends are fetched
      Returns:
      a list of DividendJpaRepository.DivdendForHoldings projections containing portfolio, account, security, holding, and dividend info

    • getIdSecurityForPeriodicallyUpdate

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> getIdSecurityForPeriodicallyUpdate(Integer daysAdded, Short maxRetryDividend)
      Possible missing dividend income in the entity Dividend for securities. This is based on the date of the last dividend payment and the periodicity of the expected payments. In addition, the dividend payments of the transactions are also taken into account if the dividend payment is more recent than the date in the dividend entity.
      Parameters:
      daysAdded - additional days to account for in the dividend frequency interval
      maxRetryDividend - maximum allowed retry count for dividend loading
      Returns:
      a list of security IDs requiring a periodic dividend update

    • getIdSecuritySplitAfterDividendWhenAdjusted

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> getIdSecuritySplitAfterDividendWhenAdjusted(List<String> idsConnectorDividend, List<Integer> idsSecurity)
      Identifies securities where a split occurred on or after the latest dividend ex‐date, indicating an adjustment is needed. In GT, dividends should also be adjusted for splits like the price data. The last split may be more recent than the most recent dividend. This query provides the IDs of the securities for which this is the case.
      Parameters:
      idsConnectorDividend - list of connector‐dividend identifiers to filter by
      idsSecurity - list of security IDs to consider
      Returns:
      a list of security IDs whose recent splits affect dividend history
